name: Hydration Peptide Cream
about: What it is:A rich, oil-free moisturizer that provides up to 72 hours of intense hydration and powerful peptides that visibly plump and firm without causing congestion..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Rich Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Peptides: Supports healthy collagen and elasticity while visibly firming and plumping..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Ideal for normal to dry skin, this oil-free moisturizer is powered by hydrosella, which is clinically shown to provide up to 72 hours of hydration, peptides to visibly firm, and squalane to nourish the skin barrier. Non-comedogenic, this rich cream nourishes skin without causing unwanted congestion..Clinical Results:In a 28-day consumer study:
ingredients: -Peptides: Supports healthy collagen and elasticity while visibly firming and plumping..-Hydrosella: Provides up to 72 hours of hydration..-Squalane: Replenishes skin, locks in moisture, and protects skin barrier...Water / Aqua / Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Squalane, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Niacinamide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide NG, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Tocopherol, Tribehenin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Lactic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lecithin, Betaine, Erythritol, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply daily to clean, dry skin morning and night. .-Massage onto face, neck, and chest. .-Appropriate for use with retinol, AHA/BHAs, vitamin C, and most actives.

reviews.review_title: Pills after using Moisture Boost Serum :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to buy this product and begin using it in my dry skin care routine. After cleansing my face, using an essence, and then using the moisture boost plumping serum, I waited for the serum to dry before applying the cream to my face. The serum felt great.  Once I applied two pumps of the moisturizer (a little goes a long way), I immediately put it on my face, and it felt great. No complaints. But after waiting 20 minutes, I briefly rubbed my hand over my face lightly, and the product started pilling. For reference,I have very dry skin (resembling the Sahara Desert lol), and I didn't use any other silicone based skincare products prior to using the peptide cream (only water based), so I'm not sure why pilling would occur. It makes me wonder if it has to do with the Shea butter in this product. I'm so disappointed/sad about this, and for that, I will be returning it. If you choose to use this under makeup, proceed with caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! I am a skincare lover and try to find the best for my skin with ingredients that my skin is going to love. I love that this moisturizer has ceramides and peptides to nourish the skin barrier and doesn't have any fragrance because fragrance irritates my skin. Although this moisturizer is oil free, it provides the skin with a good amount of moisture and hydration without feeling too lightweight or heavy. My skin is oily but is prone to dehydration at times (especially in the winter) and this balances my skin so well. Sometimes moisturizers can leave my skin feeling sweaty right after applying the moisturizer but this moisturizer doesn't do that. I also love that it comes in a larger size bottle than other moisturizers I've seen on the market but at around the same price as the other high end moisturizers. I will be repurchasing forever!

I use powder foundation and it has never looked better since using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, so I love this product so much I felt the need to write a review. For background, I have combination skin with a very oily T zone but dry everywhere else. I am also acne prone. It’s very hard to find a product that makes me feel hydrated but not like a grease ball on my forehead and nose. I used to use the peptide cream from drunk elephant but it wasn’t hydrating enough after my skin changed a bit after pregnancy. Then I used the skin fix+ cream for a while and loved it! But then my skin went back to baseline post partum and it was just too thick and I felt SO greasy by mid day. I was looking for something new and saw this on Sephora. It was New and already had 5 starts, was good for combo skin and non pore-clogging so I thought I would try it. Wow, believe the reviews people! Not only is it a great balance for my combo skin but I feel glowy and my face just looks plump and healthy. It’s a thicker cream but also feels gel-like and lightweight. Not sure how they do it but it’s perfect! The onlyyyy downside for me is the bottle. It’s a thick glass which is luxurious but also heavy which makes it somewhat inconvenient to travel with. It’s also really hard to get all the product out so I felt like some of it was wasted. But other than that, I love it. I just bought my second bottle and will continue to repurchase!

reviews.review_text: I was on the search for an extremely hydrating mask or cream I could put on at night because my skin has been so dry and dull from the skin products I use and I live in a very dry climate. I have tried so many “highly rated” products for super dry skin and I never felt like anything really worked. I was in Vegas for vacation and went to the Sephora in Miracle Mile. I asked one of the employees for literally a “super thick” hydrating cream or mask or whatever I can use that will help me wake up with softer hydrated skin. She recommended this cream and told me it isn’t the thick consistency I’m asking for, but she highly recommends it to do exactly what I want. I was skeptical because I can’t tell you how many times I have heard that and I’m not impressed. This is THE best cream I have ever used for this purpose. I even use it during the day because it’s not greasy at all. I wish I knew her name. She is a genius.

reviews.review_text: this was one of the gifts I redeemed my points for in my last order and I'm obsessed! I've never achieved glass skin look before now. I wouldn't use it for my whole face, because it would be too glowy for my personal tastes, but for under eyes and cheeks it's love at first sight. I initially put it on my forehead as that's where I'm most dry right now and immediately noticed you could practically see a reflection on my forehead, but not in a shiny oily way, in a glass skin way. I don't want my forehead that reflective but I then put the moisturizer on all my highlight points and I don't have the words for the beautiful natural healthy glow it gave, but not in a glittery mica powder way so many products have. Normally I find highlight under eyes just draws attention, but this products actually bounced light off my dark bags hiding them well. I was curious so on half my face I used my favorite highlighter and on the other half only this moisturizer as highlighter and the moisturizer side was more iridescent and I looked like I was lit from with in. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it's a little expensive and isn't ideal for full face for me. I will definitely be purchasing this once my sample runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I've been using twice daily for three weeks and it took me and my skin a second to get used to the formula. This isn't a super heavy cream and applies very smoothly but on my skin, it lingers longer than I'm used to/didn't feel like it sunk into my skin as fast was off-putting at first and felt a bit heavy. My skin has also been going through a dry patch lately, but it's on the up and up now. Like other reviewers, I have to say this is a really light and non-oily formula which I appreciate and my makeup applies nicely over it. I think this is a nice moisturizer, but I don't know if it was enough for my super dry skin lately. The packaging and formula are really nice though and I think this will be great for me in the later spring/summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this Product complimentary from Shani Darden and I was excited to try my first product from this brand. I am impressed and definitely want to try more from Shani Darden Skincare. This is a thick nice daily moisturizer, keeps my dry skin hydrated feeling and Looking healthy.  I love that it has no fragrance or harsh ingredients, only good for the skin ingredients that are effective. If you need a great moisturizer - give this one a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was gifted by Shani Darden. This is my first Shani Darden experience and I have been loving it. Everything from the packaging to the cream itself is extremely luxurious. I love how it absorbs into my skin and works well with my other skin care items.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely in love with the texture!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying Shani Darden products and I'm absolutely in love with this cream. Texture is everything I need for my aging dry skin. It feels so good and nourishing and my skin feels and looks really lively after. I also love the amazing ingredients list. Gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Shani Darden and First time trying her products because of how much people rave about them and I must say, this cream did not disappoint. I have oily combo skin and recently have been traveling a ton so my skin has been very dehydrated and flaky. I also suffer from rosacea and the flare ups have been out of control! This cream is lightweight and leaves my skin feeling super smooth while hydrating, firming and most importantly calming my irritated skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard that peptides are great for anti aging and I’m loving this new cream with the best ingredients and great quality from this brand. I prefer to use it nightly after cleansing and serum and sometimes in the mornings too, it is light enough to lay perfectly under my make up. It was gifted by Shani Darden, it is a great product and I’d definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second Shani Darden skincare experience and I'm equally happy with this moisturizer as I was with the cleanser. Her products are truly effective for dry skin. My skin feels deeply hydrated and plump since I switched to this moisturizer. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Firs time trying this brand and I love the whole experience! The packaging is gorgeous and feels really luxurious, the product it self is light weight, very minimal fragrance which I love and feels great on the skin, so far really nice results!! gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gifted by Shani Darden. The lotion is the perfect consistency- not too greasy but not too thin. I can see why this is about to be a cult favorite. The only thing I’d change is the smell - it’s not bad, just not for me.

This was gifted by Shani Darden and it has kicked out my other moisturizers in my skincare routine! I have dry skin and this give me ALL the hydration I need. Works well with my other serums in my routine and lightweight! I’ve been using both morning and night and wake up with hydrated health skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Shani Darden. My skin is very dry so anything focused on hydration is up my alley. I always moisturize in the morning and at night but mid day usually after work my skin always feels so dull and dehydrated. I do feel a difference with this slightly so I’m looking forward to continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about an oil-free cream’s ability to moisturize my very dry skin but let me tell you, this works! It’s the perfect weight for day time under my makeup and gives me a lovely, hydrated glow. I’ve always wanted to try this brand and was so excited to be gifted by Shani Darden. it lives up to the hype!

reviews.review_title: Great luxury cream leaving skin hydrated and glowy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the packaging and pump on this product. I also appreciate that it isn’t scented (in case anyone is sensitive to scents). It feels good on the skin, and even though I’ve only been using it for a couple days, I feel like my skin looks more plump and glowy. I have combination/oily skin in case that’s helpful! Literally my only qualm is it is a little pricier, but it does feel luxury. I was gifted by Shani Darden to try this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING! I have completely fallen in love with this product and have seen a difference already. It goes on so smoothly and is not heavy at all on the skin. I use it right after cleansing my face and I love it! Complimentary from Shani Darden, but I would definitely purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hydration peptide cream that I was gifted by Shani Darden. All of their products are luxurious. It is a thick moisturizer that is oil free. I have very dry skin and need all of the moisture I can get. It leaves my skin feeling very hydrated, and also makes it look firm and plump for days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. I found this very hydrating and my skin loved it. I would highly recommend this product and will plan to repurchase when this bottle runs out. I like how light weight it feels, while still being hydrating. Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted By Shani Darden* Ohhhhhh THIS IS GOOD!! I try a LOT of skincare & this got me excited! The packaging is sleek & Lux but the cream itself WOW!!! The texture is lovely and smooth it doesn’t pill. T layers beautifully under makeup it’s super hydrating for my very dry skin without being so heavy I can only use it at night- that’s what WON ME! It is light yet deeply nourishing- definitely recommend if you’re looking to expand your skincare regime

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this new moisturizer! As someone with dry skin, I normally shy away from oil-free products, but I can confirm this product is amazing for those with dry skin. After 1 use, my skin felt so hydrated, plump, and looked revitalized!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is loving this moisturizer especially since it’s been so dry out! I revived this complimentary from Shani Darden, but I really am enjoying it and would probably purchase again. I love how deeply it moisturizes without feeling heavy or greasy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Shani Darden is new to me brand and Hydration Peptide Cream is a complimentary from Shani Darden. I am quite surprised how good this Hydration Peptide Cream for my dry, sensitive skin! I’ve been struggling with some rashes & super sensitive skin lately, so it was hard for me to test out new skincare products, but I gave it a go since it’s gentle enough that I can use this cream with other actives. And it was right, my flared skin was okay with this cream. It provides good hydration throughout the day, and it went well under makeup as well. I am so glad I got to try this Hydration Peptide Cream from Shani Darden!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been working wonders on my dry skin. It blends onto my skin flawlessly. My skin feels very hydrated, and I love that it is very lightweight. I apply it at night and also before applying makeup as a base. I like that I can use it with actives too like retinol and vitamin c. Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cream complimentary from Shani Darden. I’ve been using this cream for the past couple of weeks, and I can honestly say that this is one of the best moisturizers that I have ever used. My skin feels instantly nourished and bouncy after usage. Think of how your skin feel after a 10 step skincare routine, except you’re getting those results from 1 product. Absolutely heaven.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Shani Darden for testing and reviewing purposes! It’s a beautiful moisturizer! I have a very dry skin, this moisturizer is very lightweight and creamy! Absorbs to the skin in seconds and leaves non greasy finish! My skin feels hydrated throughout the day! I love that it’s un scented and very smooth! It leaves my skin flawlessly hydrated and plump! Love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Shani Darden. This moisturizer makes my skin feel hydrated yet feels super light on the skin. There isn’t any scent and its been really easy to incorporate into my routine. Also love the packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, wow, wow! This was gifted by Shani Darden! This was the first product I’ve ever tried from Shani Darden and I’m such a believer I’m going to try other items in the line! I’m oily/combo and don’t tend to go for super hydrating products. But this is the best moisturizer I’ve found for daytime that truly makes my skin feel hydrated, deeply! Plump, firmed, hydrated, and amazing! When I’m not wearing makeup I’ll be wearing this daily because of how intensely it hydrates my skin and maintains my skin barrier. Yes!! This is it!!

reviews.review_title: A must have for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Shani Darden. I have been using this in the evening after I use my retinol. It is not light like a water moisturizer but not a heavy cream. As soon as it is applied, I feel a nice cooling effect and it sinks into my dry skin. I love that it has Squalane as an ingredient because that really give my skin hydration and it also has peptides which should give anti aging benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is just a dream! It blended into my skin so smoothly and hydrated my skin so well with out making it feel greasy or filmy. This was complimentary from Shani Darden so I loved being able to try this! It didn’t peel when I put concealer over it. It feels so luxurious and I’m excited to keep using it to see the results of long term use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a lightweight formula for a peptide moisturizer. great for warmer days switching from a heavy winter cream. I like that it’s oil free and doesn’t clog my pores. Beautiful and convenient packaging! I was gifted by Shani Darden to try her new product and I would gladly recommend it to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Shani Darden in exchange, for my honest review of this product. This is my first product buy this brand and I will have to say it is great and I am looking forward to trying more of their products. I have extremely dry skin so I love trying out hydrating moisturizer’s, and this one is great highly recommend for dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is ok. I love the gorgeous packaging. I really appreciate the texture. It’s thick and rich without it feeling too heavy on my dry skin. However, it made my skin feel a little too heavy. Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel this moisturizer is a great choice for my springtime skincare routine. As someone with dry and sensitive skin, I was impressed with how quickly the cream sunk into my skin while leaving behind a soft natural finish that didn’t feel too heavy. It doesn’t have a strong smell thank god and I love that it comes in a bigger than average size bottle. *gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand, all their products feel so good on the skin, and this was no exception.  The texture is a bit thick, but it applies smoothly, my skin absorbs quickly without leaving any oiliness and stickiness.  It leaves my skin feeling so soft!  The ingredients list is amazing too with peptides, ceramides, niacinamide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Shani Darden in exchange for my honest review. This creamy face lotion is designed to plump and hydrate skin with a combination of peptides and hyaluronic acid. It has a lightweight creamy texture that leaves skin feeling moisturized but not heavy. It is unscented and gentle, perfect as a treatment or light lotion for drier skin types or as a daily moisturizer for combo skin. I found it to be fairly calming and soothing for spots of my face that are more sensitive to irritation like around my nose and mouth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and am trying to find the perfect cream. I love that the Hydration Peptide Cream has very little scent and comes in a modern looking glass bottle with a pump. I have used the cream in the morning and evening. My skin quickly absorbs the cream and looks fresher. But overall, I feel the cream isn't rich enough for my skin right now. Gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this moisturizer especially as we’re approaching hotter weather! It’s deeply moisturizing but not heavy at all. I can use it in the morning or at night. I think people of all skin types will enjoy this one! This was gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Shani Darden in exchange for my honest review. This is so great! I was surprised because I did not know what to expect as I’ve never tried this brand. I love how well it absorbs and it’s not super greasy. Great for my dry skin during the day and makeup layers atop it beautifully. I’m sold !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Shani Darden. First, this is packaged in such a beautiful glass bottle. I appreciate the pump, it allows me to control the amount of moisturizer. On to the actual moisturizer itself, I’m not the biggest fan. It’s moisturizing and doesn’t make my combo skin oily, not sure if dry skin this would be enough. I had a few breakouts after using. Not the biggest fan but appreciate the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always a fan of this line’s packaging- it feels really quality and doesn’t have a ton of plastic. I have dry skin and am weathering the Midwestern winter season currently, so this cream has been a godsend. It helps calm my dry and chapped skin but doesn’t break me out! It helped my skin hold onto hydration all day, which is something I occasionally struggle with. I also love that this cream comes in a bottle with a pump rather than a pot- it is so much more hygienic!   Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice surprise, I didn't expect it to work so well for my skin. It usually takes me more time to see results. But this has made my texture much smoother. My skin looks good. Now I have to try their retinol. Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_title: Perfect oil free cream for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this gifted by Shani Darden Skin Care Hydration Peptide Cream and this definitely didn’t disappoint leaving my skin silky smooth and hydrated. It’s a rich oil free formula that felt great on my skin and absorbs nicely with a little going a long way. This is the perfect cream for dry skin! It really has helped hydrate my skin. It is rich but won’t clog your pores or anything making it the perfect cream!

reviews.review_title: The glow it gives is amazing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream hydrates my dry skin so well! It’s lightweight and fragrance free and makes my skin look dewy, plump and fresh. Makeup applies perfectly over top of it, although most days now I opt to go makeup free because my skin looks so fantastic! I have sensitive skin and it doesn’t clog my pores or break me out at all. And the hydration really lasts! I can’t say it lasts 72 hours because I don’t go that long without washing my face and reapplying, but it certainly does last all day! This cream was gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Shani Darden. Really appreciate the glass packing and ingredients, peptidesakes such a huge difference in my skincare routine and since using this serum my skin has never looked or felt better. I'm 36 and have better skin now than when I was in my early 20's.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Shani Darden for review  And I am so impressed with this oil free deep moisturizer! I am used to thicker moisturizers, especially ones with peptides, being at least a little bit oily or greasy on the skin afterwards, at least for a little while. I have normal to oily skin that is sensitive, so I often use dry skin products because they are often more gentle on my skin, but the trade off is they can be a bit too heavy at times. The Shani Darden isn't! Being oil free, it reminds me a bit of my Biossance Omega cream (also because of the light olive-ish scent a little too), but the Shani moisturizer melts into the skin way faster, and doesn't leave that dewy layer on like the thicker creams do.   It really is an amazing peptide cream that makes my skin look fresh, hydrated, and less tired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and I focus on hydration to balance it out and thankfully this is oil-free! It's an easy one to incorporate into your existing routines that may have many actives. You only really need 2 pumps! - gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this moisturizer gifted by Shani Darden - It’s lightweight which is important to me and a little goes along way! It’s a creamy consistency, and goes on so smooth revealing a dewy, glowy, hydrated looking skin. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, this is the best, more reasonably priced, no frills, effective lightweight moisturizer I’ve ever tested! No scent, not even the unpleasant almost play-doh like scent many unscented products tend to have.. Beautiful heavy glass bottle with a solid pump.. Moisturizing enough for my dry skin without oils (unheard of!) but light enough to feel fresh & nourishing WITHOUT clogging pores! ALL the claims are true! lol So if you have normal to dry, even sensitive, skin & are prone to blackheads/acne, I would HIGHLY recommend trying this. It’s definitely going to be my favorite warm month moisturizer & I would repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice moisturizer if you have dry skin, but cannot stand heavier moisturizer on your skin. Does the job beautifully and has outstanding ingredients. It is oil free and noncomedogenic, and the packaging feels very high quality and chic. Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_title: Not A Must Have, But Still Very Nice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shani Darden gifted me the new Hydration Peptide Cream in exchange for my honest review. This lightweight moisturizer is hydrating and feels nice and silky on the skin. I have very dry skin so this is not a moisturizer I can use alone but it is a nice additional step to do before I apply my thicker moisturizer and SPF in the morning. When I used this product in my nighttime routine - which includes a few more steps than my morning skincare routine - I did notice some pilling so I would be careful when layering with other products in your collection. Still, the luxurious packaging is beautiful and really makes this a lovely product to interact with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely my new favorite moisturizer. I use it twice a day and it gives my face the hydration it needs. I have dry skin and this moisturizer hydrates and slightly plumps my skin. I’ve been using it for a week and I can definitely notice the change in my skin and I’m loving it It’s not super greasy but my skin is able to absorb the product while still leaving, my face feeling moisturized . This products was gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Shani Darden and her minimalist but powerhouse skincare approach. I have her wand system, eye cream, and lactic acid. They have worked wonders on my skin. I was very kindly gifted by shani Darden to try this brand new peptide cream and it’s super luxurious and moisturizing! I love how my skin feels extremely moisturizer without being too heavy and that I’m receiving some anti-agin benefits. Her entire line is magic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is just what the dry skin girls need! Summer is almost here, so I’ve been looking into new moisturizers that’ll keep my skin hydrated and glowing. I use this at night and I wake up to my skin being firm, smooth and moisturized! The packaging is also beautiful and well made which makes this an amazing peptide cream while also serving esthetics. This product has zero smell and distributes extremely well. I’ll definitely be repurchasing once I run out. This is summer girl certified! ❤️ #GiftedbyShaniDarden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Shani Darden. This cream is very hydrating. It feels really light on the skin. My skin absorbs it really quickly. It plays well under makeup. It makes my skin feel and look plump all the long. Love how that it helps my foundation to not look dry at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from Shani Darden. Oh my goodness...I LOVE this cream! I'm actually shocked how much I love it because it's an oil free moisturizer, but still provides amazing hydration for my dry skin. I'm also obsessed with the fact that the bottle is over 2oz so the value for money is great. I can use this both morning and night and the ingredient list is just amazing. I'm so happy with this moisturizer!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: #GiftedbyShaniDarden My goodness! This paired with the Cleansing Serum is just phenomenal. I’m all in for anything with peptides, and my dry skin absolutely adores this moisturizer. The rich texture melts into the skin beautifully leaving it incredibly plump, hydrated and firm. I’ll never be without this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels nice on the skin! Would love to see more results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lovee this moisturizer! Makes my skin feel super hydrated and feels super light on my skin. No scent and works well with all of my other skin care routine products. I will definitely continue to use it! Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out. I did not notice this had niacinamide before I started using it. If you are at all sensitive to that, I would skip this. Packaging is quite nice, and I imagine this would be a hydrating moisturizer for people without sensitivity to any ingredients in it. Gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer it’s so hydrating and makes my skin so plump. I already love Shani Darden products so I knew she wouldn’t miss with this one. I saw immediate results even with just one use. Highly recommend! Gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Shani Darden.  With aging dry skin, I’m always looking try skincare with hydration and anti-aging benefits.  The Shani Darden hydration peptide cream comes in a sleek design pump, making it easy to dispense the product without any mess.  The cream doesn’t have any scent.  It provides great hydration to my dry skin in this harsh dry winter.  My skin feels more plump with continuous use.  This product is great for my skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizers are my favorite type of skincare product so going into trying out gifted by Shani Darden Hydration Peptide Cream, I was excited. This moisturizer is light without the heavy greasy feeling (since no oils are inside). Your dry cracked skin gets healed … yes it did to me! My chin has been dry lately and nothing seemed to work. I applied extra here and within a week it went back to normal. I love that it’s non comedogenic so it won’t clog my pores even more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin

Complimentary from Shani Darden

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It feels very light and refreshing on application and moisturizes my skin. My skin is looking plump, hydrated and feels silky soft and smooth. It really makes my skin look radiant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i freaking love this cream i enjoy how hydrating this cream is and so easy to apply is becoming one of my holy grails

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This product felt amazing on my skin immediately upon first reaction. It’s thick and nourishing while remaining thin and lightweight with consistency! It left my skin with a nice glow and the more I used it I felt my skin to look more plump and healthy! I always need a good thick cream but don’t like the feeling of the stickiness and residue it tends to leave on my skin, this cream gave me all the benefits without leaving any residue! Love! Received this product for review but this is my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

I was hoping it would work since it’s formulated for my skin type, but I have to add more moisture to my dry areas. However, I can see where this would be awesome for other people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream so much.  I have dry skin however I can’t use thick moisturizers because it almost all the time clogs my pores. However, this one is lightweight but has incredible moisturizing factor!! I love the ingredients and how my skin feels soft and smooth while looking hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating and moisturizing. My sensitive skin loved this moisturizer, caused no irritation. The texture is light but packs a punch with loaded peptides and other moisturizing ingredients. Will continue to enjoy the full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Hydration Peptide Cream complimentary from Shani Darden. I recently started using it and I have to say, I'm really impressed with it! What I love most about this cream is how easily it absorbs into my skin without leaving any residue or greasiness. It feels light and refreshing on the skin and provides long-lasting hydration throughout the day. I also appreciate the good ingredients packed in this cream - peptides and hyaluronic acid,  which my skin loves and that they help to hydrate and firm the skin.

reviews.review_title: If you have DRY SKIN this is a MUST TRY!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I’m always on the hunt to find that it cream or serum to add to my regiment. Gifted by Shani Darden I will never sugarcoat my reviews. It either works for me or doesn’t. This is incredible!! So moisturizing, so smooth, so silky, and the healthy luminosity is undeniable. The peptides in here plumps my skin beautifully as well.  I've been using this cream for almost a week and actually am loving it. It is thick and rich, it glides on smoothly and feels so good on my skin.. Hydration and moisturized instantaneously, and bouncy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has a really beautiful weight to it-it’s nourishing without being too heavy but it’s still substantial. I have dry skin that can be sensitive on occasion, and this has been lovely in both my morning and evening routines and pairs well with my exfoliating serums without any issues with pilling. The packaging is gorgeous, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry sensitive acne prone skin and my skin absolutely loved this cream! I have to be careful with creams because they can clog my pores but this one doesn't. It instantly hydrates my skin and my skin looks so plump afterwards. The I received this product complimentary from Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow - this cream is fantastic.  I have dry but acne prone skin so a challenge I face is getting enough moisture without clogging my pores and getting whiteheads.  Many gel moisturizers are pretty drying.  This feels like a richer cream (but it has a pump, yay! jars are gross) but it's oil free.  It feels SO nourishing and hydrating on the skin. It does contain shea butter and squalene which are not supposed to clog pores.  So far, I love this cream. The jar is gorgeous, heavy and luxe, and the bottle is 75ml instead of most creams which are 30.  gifted by shani darden but my honest feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This peptide cream was a gift in exchange for an honest review. I have got to say, this cream is amazing. I have dry skin and ever since I’ve been using this, my skin has had the nicest glow and is so smooth. I love the consistency and I’ve incorporated this in my everyday skincare routine. Will be buying a back up of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Shani Darden in exchange for my honest review. This cream is SO nice. It’s not too thin and not too thick. It left my skin feeling plump and hydrated all day and makeup went on top of it beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly creamy light weight moisturizer. Definitely have seen a difference in how my face looks the morning after I use it. It looks more glowing and even toned. As it states, it doesn’t clog pores and I have very acne prone skin and it hasn’t given me any acne or sensitive skin issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved everything i've tried from shani darden so far and this is no exception! I'm a huge fan of peptides and really think they help visibly plump and firm. This was gifted by shani darden skincare for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh, this peptide cream is so thick and rich, and does exactly what I need it to do in the snowy winter climate I'm in. It is absolutely saving my moisture barrier. reviews.review_text: So I want to start out saying that I have really enjoyed using the Shani Darden products I have been able to use however this particular product is not something I can get behind. Gifted by Shani Darden

reviews.review_title: Truly versatile & moisturizing enough for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m solidly in “aging skin” territory and have noticed a definite drop in elasticity and “bounce”. I love peptide products and they generally work well for me, and this one is no exception - however, it is the first one I’ve tried that really works AM and PM. I normally have to apply an oil-based cream before bed to keep my skin from drying out overnight, but not with this - it keeps my skin hydrated and supple until morning and I don’t wake up with dry patches! I love the smooth creamy feel of this, almost like pudding, and it works wonderfully with any other product in my skincare routine. Another win from Shani!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This feels SO GOOD on my skin. Once you pump it out, it is on the thicker side but it absorbs so well on the skin. It doesn’t leave and oily residue and it feels super lightweight. When I was rubbing it into my skin, I noticed how creamy and fluffy it feels. There’s barely a sent to it (in my opinion) which is also nice. The bottle feels super luxurious too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Wow! I’m new to trying Shani Darden and have used a few products in the past, but this new moisturizer is incredible! It helps keep my skin hydrated but never oily and it is so plump and firm! I love the anti-aging benefits this has and it is non-comedogenic. I get milia easily so I have to stay as much oil free as I can for makeup and skincare. Definitely recommend this one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to share with everyone my experience with the Shani Darden Peptide Cream. Let me tell you, this product is a game changer! I have been struggling with dry skin on my face, and this cream has really made a difference. It really moisturizes my skin and gives it a much-needed boost of hydration.  One thing that I absolutely loved about this product is that it doesn't have a scent. This is a big plus for me as I am quite sensitive to scented products, and often find them overwhelming. With this cream, I don't have to worry about any irritation or allergic reactions.   Another great feature of this product is the fact that it's in a bottle with a pump. This makes it so much more hygienic than creams that come in jars, which can be exposed to dirt and bacteria. I love this added convenience and peace of mind.  All in all, I highly recommend the Shani Darden Peptide Cream to anyone who is looking for a hydrating and nourishing cream for their face. It has done wonders for my skin, and I'm sure it will do the same for you!

reviews.review_text: I love this cream so much, it makes my skin so soft to the touch and increased the hydration so well. It even makes my makeup glide so much nicer when using during the day. Complimentary from Shani Darden USA

reviews.review_title: I love this for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream for my very dry, very reactive/sensitive skin is INCREDIBLE… I’ve also used and loved her eye cream. I know her stuff is pricey but it truly is well worth it to me. While I was gifted this from Shani Darden I can say I have given plenty of bad reviews through skeepers and still continue to get products to try out so I have no problem being honest. This has zero scent, is very lightweight and sinks in pretty immediately. Not heavy or greasy at all. I do recommend this if you’re looking for something lightweight and you are acne prone or have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: love, light weight hydrating and plumping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This peptide cream is amazing ! It feels very light weight and adds ample hydration to my skin. I feel like this really plumps my skin up and makes me feel very nourished. I like this so much I can’t wait to try other products from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with Shani Darden products! This is one brand I know that I can count on for giving me top quality products that are going to actually make a difference on my skin and suit my sensitive skin. I love the packaging of this product as well as it makes it easy to use. I love all the skin loving ingredients in this product. It is the perfect product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Give me all the peptides! This is a dream of a product for both hydration and anti aging, and works really well in conjunction with any retinol or retinoid to counteract dryness and irritation from stronger products  Gifted by Shani Darden

This moisturizer has been a life saver during the cold, dry, winter months! I have really sensitive skin that easily breaks out when applying creams or moisturizers, but this moisturizer is great as it doesn't make my skin break out and leaves it feeling soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cream, provides great hydration and nourishing my skin really well. Easy to apply, absorbs quickly, I  enjoy adding it to my daily beauty routine. Love the texture. High quality. Was gifted by Shani Darden.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand Shani Darden! First the package look luxurious and has a great smell and texture! After applying to my skin , my face looked brighter and softer! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so luxurious and hydrating! It feels weightless on the skin and has zero scent. I’m so impressed by the heavy glass packaging as well. I would definitely try out the rest of the products in this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is theeeee best! It was made for normal to dry skin which I am normal to dehydrated skin and I love the feeling of a heavier moisturizer I’ve never liked a gel moisturizer and this is AMAZING! Such an amazing product, texture, no smell. I tested it last night and my skin woke up feeling plump, not sticky, not dehydrated like it normally does. I then washed my face with water, added a serum and applied two more pumps and my skin is plump and glowy and hydrated. Worked perfectly under my sunscreen and now makeup!! I normally get clogged pores from the thick moisturizers I choose but the formulation on this is stunning. Made as oil free and non comedogenic is exactly what I was told to use!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving what this cream is doing for my skin. I feel like it is still light but incredibly nourishing. It’s just makes my skin have the incredibly soft bouncy skin feel right away. I feel like it is helping plump and firm overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This hydration peptide cream has been amazing!! I feel like I’ve tried ever moisturizer under the sun and this has quickly become my favorite. I’ve only been using it for a short amount of time but it is incredible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful moisturizer that provides deep moisture to the skin while being oil free! It has amazing ingredients like Peptides and Squalane and work so well for all skin types! I have dry skin and Normally I prefer moisturizers with oils but this one has been wonderful in this transition spring weather!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have Shani Darden’s serum cleanser and really loved that, so I was excited to try out this peptide cream. The product is for normal to dry skin, so it’s pretty rich. Very hydrating with really great ingredients including niacinamide, ceramide and squalane. A good product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Hydration Peptide Cream complimentary from Shani Darden. This cream is making a big difference in how my dry skin is doing this winter - this makes it feel hydrated and soft instead of dry and flaky. I’ve tried this with and without a hydrating serum underneath and I can say that this was the product that was really making the difference.
